title: Spectre Staff
summaries: The Spectre Staff is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that fires a fast-moving (61 mph) white "Lost Soul" projectile which homes in on the nearest enemy. The projectile looks similar to the one fired by the Ragged Caster, but cannot travel through blocks. On [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile, the Lost Soul projectiles can also deal damage (or "pierce") three times before disappearing. The Spectre Staff has a 1/20 (5%) / 39/400 (9.75%) chance of being dropped by Ragged Casters in the post-Plantera Dungeon.

statistics.Damage: 65 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 68 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Magic)
